items.title: Trump’s Energy Department forbids staff from saying ‘climate change’ or ‘green’
items.description: A Trump appointee emailed Office of Energy Efficiency and Renewable Energy employees last week with a long list of banned words.

items.title: Final day to apply: Volunteer at TechCrunch Disrupt 2025
items.description: If you’ve been thinking about applying to volunteer at TechCrunch Disrupt 2025, this is it — applications close tonight at 11:59 p.m. PT. Only accepti...

items.title: OpenAI rolls out safety routing system, parental controls on ChatGPT
items.description: The new safety features come after numerous incidents of ChatGPT validating users' delusional thinking instead of redirecting harmful conversations --...

items.title: Snapchat caps free Memory storage, launches paid storage plans
items.description: The social media giant announced that free access to the feature will be limited to 5GB.

items.title: Bluesky rolls out age verification for users in Ohio
items.description: Users in Ohio will have to verify their age to use Bluesky's social network as of Monday.
